name: Curve Yield Seeker
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

en.name: Curve Yield Seeker
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

fr.name: Curve Yield Seeker
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) pour gagner du CRV. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie. La stratégie dépose automatiquement à le pool Curve la plus rentable.

es.name: Curve Yield Seeker
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) para ganar CRV. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia. La estrategia cambia automáticamente al grupo de Curve más rentable.

de.name: Curve Yield Seeker
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

el.name: Curve Yield Seeker
el.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

tr.name: Curve Yield Seeker
tr.description: CRV kazanmak için [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi)'a {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır. Strateji otomatik olarak en karlı Curve havuzuna geçer.

vi.name: Curve Yield Seeker
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

zh.name: Curve Yield Seeker
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) 赚取 CRV。收获代币后，卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。策略会自动调整到收益最高的 Curve 池。

hi.name: Curve Yield Seeker
hi.description: CRV अर्जित करने के लिए {{token}} से [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) की आपूर्ति करता है। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है। रणनीति स्वचालित रूप से सबसे अधिक लाभदायक Curve पूल में बदल जाती है।
